body.name: Extra Large Air Fryer Basket for Oven, 18.7'' x 11.9'' Stainless Steel Crisper Basket for Convection Oven, Baking Pan Perfect for the Grill, Dishwasher Safe, 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 1 hr 51 mins
features: Air Fryer Basket for Oven: Air fryer Basket, Basket size is 18.7‘’ x 11.9''. This basket is perfect for making fried foods in convection ovens and provides a healthy option without having to fry excessive amounts of oil. Provide perfect and even crispy taste for all your favorite foods!

Dishwasher Safe: Made from high-quality, durable, and non-toxic stainless steel, our oven Basket is heat-resistant and dishwasher safe. You can use it as an air fryer basket for an oven with an air fry option or a simple bacon pan. Cleaning up has never been easier.

360° Circulation Heating: Our air fryer rack allows for even heat circulation, so you don't need to flip or turn your food while cooking. This means you can cook your food evenly without the risk of burning it. This ensures that your food is evenly cooked and crispy on all sides.

Non-toxic & No Paint: Our air fryer baskets have a solid structure, and will not deform after long-term use. Be different from copper air fryer basket, it is rust-proof and has no paint, so you won't have to worry about rust and paint falling off.

Service Guarantee: To ensure quality, each of our oven air fryer baskets undergoes strict quality control before leaving the factory. If you have any questions about our air fryer basket for the convection oven, please feel free to contact us, we will reply to you within 24 hours and give you a satisfactory solution!
body.description: 2 Pack Air Fryer Basket for Oven, Stainless Steel Crisping Basket, Oven crisper for French fry & frozen foodBasket size is 18.7‘’ x 11.9''FeaturesStainless Steel that's durable yet lightweight, food-grade, non-toxic and dishwasher safe.360-degree heat circulation, cooking food to a perfect browning all over. The curved grid design helps airflow and evenly distributes heat around the food, ensuring that the food will not burn when leaving the oven faster. Excellent cooking and toasting performance!The oven air fryer basket is also the perfect cooling rack for cooking and baking, a grill basket, also fruits and vegetables drain basket, also can place tableware and cups.With high heat resistant, it's oven & grill safe up to 600°.The surfaces of baking plates and grills are mirror polished to keep them smooth and shiny all the time, which means it is easy to remove bread crumbs or grease from the basket.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this air basket
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Air Fryer Basket and Tray from Amazon. The basket is very large, which can hold a lot of food. Great for large families or just for air frying different kinds of food at once. And, the tray help keep your oven clean. I am very happy with my purchase. It’s a healthier way to fry and I use it all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, nice large size, but difficult to clean
reviews.reviewText: This air basket and tray work pretty well in place of an air frier but MORE baking/roasting time than listed in fryer recipes needs to be added. The unit is difficult to clean but wrapping the tray in aluminum foil helps greatly. I’ve ordered parchment paper with holes to aid in cleanup of air basket—hope that helps.
